Description: Sardonyx gem engraved with three two-horse chariots racing; in the centre is a obelisk with a sculptured rattle, serpent and ibis.
Bibliographic references: Gem / Catalogue of Engraved Gems & Cameos, Greek, Etruscan & Roman in the British Museum (2129)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2005-2006, 26 Nov-26 Feb, Frankfurt, Liebieghaus, Egypt, Greece & Rome
